english.segment1: Somebody told me about a place. Oh I can see it. But I've got to change my ways. Day after day its the same old thing. I keep repeating, the reason I stay this way
english.segment2: I know what I have to do. Get back to what I know is true
english.segment3: Chorus: When everything is broken, Theres a door wide open. Youll find me running through. More than just emotion. My broken heart has chosen, Jesus Im running to You. Im running to You
english.segment4: I'm running, running to you. I'm running, running to you
english.segment5: I can see the tear on your face. You feel defeated. Wondering what are you living for. Selfish dreams left you time and time. Empty-handed. Theres got to be something more. You know what you have to do. Get back to Who you know is true. (Chorus)
english.segment6: You're the only one. Who can fix what I've become. Oh God, I believe in your love
english.segment7: When everything is broken, Theres a door wide open. Youll find me running to You. More than just emotion. My broken heart has chosen, Jesus Im running to You
